StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: 1 ~~ s of Industrial experience as a SAS programmer with Globallogic technology Pvt. Ltd, Gurugram, Haryana. Strong command over BASE SAS, SAS/SQL and SAS MACROS. Having experience of working on several high priority issues that occurs during the process, monitoring end to end reports and preparation of daily and monthly reports using Excel. Strong leadership, problem-solving, planning, team-building and project management skills. Worked in a team of 5 members.

PositionHistory.Title: Associate Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Project Name: Travel domain Duration: Ongoing DEC 2018 -AUG 2019 Platform & Tools: Base SAS, SAS/SQL Team Size: 7 Project Description: Used to work in travel domain to Improve the quality of data available on Google Products by filtering the bad data and uploading it to the back end data of Google. This was used for better user experience by using data extracting tools. Role: Associate Analyst
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ c09514a1179465e401804435a0e176&sid=3810263223&AT=1580680988 2/2/20 23&03
Responsibilities: Check the data integrity like: key value shouldn't be null, duplicates not in key variable, dates check etc. Requirements gathering and analysis. Create temporary and permanent data sets using temporary and permanent Libraries. Validating the datasets and comparing the results to that of source programmers output Developed various forms of outputs like RTF, HTML, PDF files using SAS ODS facility. Provided reports with minimum risk and optimum result. Participated in project meetings, presentations and updating research findings

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 65% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.A (Political Science) from D.A.V College, Panjab University, Chandigarh in 2017

sov:SchoolOrInstitutionTypeUserArea.sov:NormalizedSchoolName: D A V College Panjab University

SpeakingEvent.Description: Participated in project meetings, presentations and updating research findings
